articles.author: Stuart Marsh
articles.title: Woolworths phases out plastic bags in WA as ban looms - 9News
articles.description: From July 1 this year, West Australian businesses can no longer supply any plastic shopping bag with handles, disposable straws or stirrers, plastic cutlery or plates or even polystyrene takeaway containers.
